__e: - Elizabeth Fisher was staying at the Algonquin. - Who's Elizabeth Fisher? - Her name used to be Evelyn, and she's my mother.
But also, I can't stop thinking about Evelyn and her kids.
I'm gonna call Evelyn and see if there's anything I can do.
Evelyn's not the type to leave loose ends.
Who's to say that Evelyn is not doing the same thing?
Evelyn, I'm not some dog you can keep in a cage.
